name: MADCAMEL for Watch
description:
Do not compare with others! We'll show you an irresistible addiction.
MADCAMEL for Watch!

A camel who gets a job as an assistant resident to earn a treatment fee will be given a job to thread a needle. However, it is becoming more and more difficult to carry out the work. Will camel be able to earn medical treatment without being fired?
This game uses watch to determine the location of the thread by turning the crown.
Enjoy the game with more delicate manipulation!
